descriptions.limiter: Limits maximum level to prevent clipping.
descriptions.exciter: Adds harmonic content to brighten audio.
descriptions.truepeak: Professional true-peak limiting and stereo metering.
descriptions.crossfeed: Simulates speaker-like listening on headphones by blending channels.
descriptions.bassmono: Makes low frequencies mono for better translation and vinyl/club compatibility.
descriptions.dynamiceq: Automatically adjusts EQ based on band dynamics.
descriptions.tapesat: Adds analog tape warmth and harmonic saturation.
descriptions.bitdither: Bit reduction and dither for lo-fi character or professional format conversion.
